StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetCandidateLegalO.enseSummary]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
(@PersonID int)
AS
DECLARE @Tra.cO.enses int DECLARE @NonTra.cO.enses int DECLARE @MisconductO.enses int DECLARE @MarijuanaCount int DECLARE @MajorMisconductO.enses int DECLARE @AdultMajorMisconductO.enses int DECLARE @JuvenileMajorMisconductO.enses int DECLARE @MostRecentOccasion int
SELECT @Tra.cO.enses = COUNT(*) FROM [usmc].[CandidateLegalO.ense] clo WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN [usmc].[LegalO.ense] lo ON clo.[PersonId] = @PersonID AND clo.LegalO.enseId = lo.LegalO.enseId AND lo.LegalO.enseTypeId = 1
SELECT @NonTra.cO.enses = COUNT(*) FROM [usmc].[CandidateLegalO.ense] clo WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN [usmc].[LegalO.ense] lo ON clo.[PersonId] = @PersonID AND clo.LegalO.enseId = lo.LegalO.enseId AND lo.LegalO.enseTypeId = 2
SELECT @MisconductO.enses = COUNT(*) FROM [usmc].[CandidateLegalO.ense] clo WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN [usmc].[LegalO.ense] lo ON clo.[PersonId] = @PersonID AND clo.LegalO.enseId = lo.LegalO.enseId AND lo.LegalO.enseTypeId = 3
SELECT @MarijuanaCount = COUNT(*) FROM [usmc].[CandidateLegalO.ense] clo WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE clo.[PersonId] = @PersonID AND clo.LegalO.enseId = 316
SELECT @MajorMisconductO.enses = COUNT(*) FROM [usmc].[CandidateLegalO.ense] clo WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN [usmc].[LegalO.ense] lo ON clo.[PersonId] = @PersonID AND clo.LegalO.enseId = lo.LegalO.enseId AND lo.LegalO.enseTypeId = 4
SELECT @AdultMajorMisconductO.enses = COUNT(*) FROM [usmc].[CandidateLegalO.ense] clo WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN [usmc].[LegalO.ense] lo ON clo.[PersonId] = @PersonID AND clo.LegalO.enseId = lo.LegalO.enseId AND clo.IsJuvenile = 0 AND lo.LegalO.enseTypeId = 4
SELECT @JuvenileMajorMisconductO.enses = COUNT(*) FROM [usmc].[CandidateLegalO.ense] clo WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN [usmc].[LegalO.ense] lo ON clo.[PersonId] = @PersonID AND clo.LegalO.enseId = lo.LegalO.enseId AND clo.IsJuvenile = 1 AND lo.LegalO.enseTypeId = 4
SELECT @MostRecentOccasion = MAX(WaiverOccasionId) FROM [usmc].[CandidateLegalO.ense] WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE [PersonId] = @PersonID
SELECT @Tra.cO.enses AS Tra.c ,@NonTra.cO.enses AS NonTra.c ,@MisconductO.enses AS Misconduct ,@MarijuanaCount AS MarijuanaCount ,@MajorMisconductO.enses AS MajorMisconduct ,@AdultMajorMisconductO.enses AS AdultMajorMisconduct ,@JuvenileMajorMisconductO.enses AS JuvenileMajorMisconduct ,@MostRecentOccasion AS MostRecentOccasion
